description: Are you in charge of your non profit organization's GivingTuesday campaign? Are you looking to raise 4, 5, or 6 figure donations this year? This executive-style, social media marketing Udemy course gives you tips, tricks, and hacks to increase donations for your non profit organization. This course will give you the foundation to create and execute the best GivingTuesday campaign for your non profit organization. If you’re running behind schedule or thinking, “maybe next year”, then this course is for you. I’ve Included with this course a sample GivingTuesday appeal letter, email copy, social media content, and links to valuable resources. Used correctly, this course will return 10x the investment with donations ranging from $500, $1000, or $10,000. Don’t waste another minute. Invest in your organization and start planning your best GivingTuesday campaign.
title: GivingTuesdsay: A Survival Guide
